Meeting with Dr. Cardonza – Aligning with the Customer’s NeedsDr. Cardonza
"Bottom line, my priorities are side effects, increase in serum sodium, and hyponatremia that has resisted correction to fluid restriction.

A couple other areas we focus on are patient satisfaction and achievement against quality indicators, such as JCAHO. We want our patients leaving the hospital confident that they received the best possible care, and we want to show that third parties recognize that quality as well. When we combine good statistics with high patient satisfaction, we have a formula for success. It’s one of the reasons we’re a top hospital for cardiac care."
